Text: Anyone know if this comes with the pre order bonuses?

Has anyone been able to get on Multiplayer and Escalation ? when i attempt to it tells me could not create account [Invalid Keycode] while trying to join the mutiplayer and escalation online part of the game.
Has anyone found out how to get into those online sections of the game because id like to try the online portion of the game as well ..need help plz

Time and time again I am unable to download this game, and others recently.  It keeps telling me that the buddha.dll file is missing and can't run the game.  Can anyone help me with this issue?  Please and thank you.

xnate128x,,, that sounds like you have some kind of virus protection running, that when you download the buddha.dll file it is automatically deleting it out. If you do have it running, turn it off, also you might have a firewall running, check to see if you do and turn it off just temporarily so you can get the files. But if you turn on your virus protection if will automatically delete that buddha.dll file out again.
Why is it downloading so slow? 30 kb/s .. good speed. Why are there so all downloads? What happened? Earlier I had a short 3.5 mb/s ... I'll pull this low speed two weeks lol ...

i never get disappointed on Black Box rips however after i installed this one and run it for the first time i get stuck on loading screen with spinning head icon i waited for 30 minutes still nothing happen
The Fucking Loading Screen problem is Solved by installing a Software called "Steam".........Googled alot n atlast it was as simple as my Ass !!!
